Hi Ted, 
As I mentioned when I believe we first discussed this, the volume of materials is considerable, and our review is ongoing. 
At this point, we don't have any affirmative information to provide, but we're happy to be in touch going forward. 
Thanks, 
From: Ted Gibbs < 
Sent: Monday, November 18, 2019 7:21 PM 
To: 
Cc:

Colleen Mullen 
Subject: RE: CONFIDENTIAL: Victim Reports Against Jeffrey Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) 
>; 
H 
I  am following up regarding our August 5, 2019, email to confirm whether our clients are depicted in any of the 
photographs seized from Jeffrey Epstein's home. I have attached three PDF files for your review which contain 
pictures of our clients, 
Please respond at your earliest convenience. Thank you. 
I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
Best regards, 
Teri Gibbs 
On Mon, Aug 5, 2019 at 3:52 PM 
Teri Gibbs 
Hi 
> wrote: 
Thank ou for takin the time to s ieak with our firm on Friday, August 2, 2019, regarding our clients, 
who believe they were assaulted by Epstein in or around June 2004. 
We have confirmed our clients' availability for interviews with y e. Ms. s available for an 
in-person interview on August 26, 2019, or August 27, 2019. Ms ho is located in , is available 
for an interview via video conference referably the week of August 26th. Please confirm whether your office 
is available to meet with Ms. those dates and whether we can arrange a video conference for Ms.

of Ms. d Ms m 2004. If possible, please confirm whether our clients are in any of the 
photographs seized from ps ems home. 
Thank you. We look forward to hearing from you soon. 
Best regards, 
Teri Gibbs
